Starting as a computer in the segregated West Area Computing Division at @NASA_Langley, Mary Jackson worked her way to become @NASA’s first African-American female engineer. She also advocated for the hiring of more women in #STEM careers at NASA. #WomensHistoryMonth pic.twitter.com/RTOMKEhj0w

Dorothy Vaughan was the first African-American mathematician, human computer & first African-American female supervisor at @NASA_Langley.
